𓂚 Teti Hor-Aha
𓂚 𓐮 𓌕 𓌔 𓌓 𓌒 bow ≈ arrow 𒌁 tir 𒄑𒌁 𓄝 𒋾𒊏 ti'rah₂ ti'rah 𓂧 𓂋 𓄛 𓄜 𓄝 "to shoot an arrow" 𓀎

𒌁 tir 𓂚 ≈ tilpanu 𒌀𒉺𒉡 til-pa-nu “bow” 𒉼 PAN
